general_advisory: Due to forecast of very light rainfall, the harvesting of crops be postponed for few days. Go for sowing of rabi crops. In case of moisture stress in pockets, foliar application of 1% KCL solution at reproductive stages will reduce the impact of moisture condition without much loss in yield.

advisory: In case of Neck Blast incidence spraying of Carbendazim 50 WP @ 2 g/liter or Tricyclazole 75 WP @ 0.6 g/lit of water may be done for controlling the disease. Farmers are advised to broadcast Utera Crop on standing paddy crop 15 -20 days before harvesting.
Collect good quality seeds like UP 262. Treat the seeds with vitavax power @ 2 g per kg seeds. Before sowing also treat with 600 g PSB per acre. The seed rate is 40 kg per acre.

Farmers who wish to cultivate mustard crop, may start sowing after preparation of the field and Select the improved seed, recommended for this region like Varuna, Pusa Bold, M 27, Anuradha etc. 3 kg seeds are required for cultivation in one acre. Sow the seed in line at a distance of 30 cm. (Row to row) and 10 cm. (Plant to plant).
To control fall army worm farmers are advised to spray emmamectin benzoate 5SG @ 0.4 g/l of water.
There is chances of Shoot and fruit borer infestation. Spray emamectin benzoate 5% SG @ 80 g in 200 l of water/acre or carbaryl 50% WP @ 800 g in 200 l of water/acre.
Cattle sheds should be well protected from flies and mosquitoes to maintain milk production and prevention from disease
Give mineral feed @ 3 % of the body mass.
